alert.note: Alert for Parke; Vermillion; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 9:51AM EST until February 06 at 6:15AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River from Lafayette to Vincennes. .Lowland flooding continues along the Wabash River from Lafayette to Riverton, and will arrive at Vincennes Wednesday morning. The crest is currently near Clinton. Flooding is expected to continue along the lower Wabash at Riverton and Vincennes well into next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 06... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Montezuma. * WHEN...Until Tuesday, February 06. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Floodwater is near the top of all agricultural levees. Some county roads are impassable. High water isolates a few rural residents. Basement flooding begins along Water Street in Montezuma. Medusa Aggregates Company Plant Number 9 begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 22.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 AM EST Tuesday was 22.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Monday evening and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 100 AM EST /midnight CST/.
